name: The Adventures of Little Guy
description:
The Adventures of Little Guy is a platformer with puzzle elements. You play the role of Little Guy who is trying to find his dog. You control Little Guy by pressing a variety of buttons that activate Little Guy’s powers available in each level. You must use these powers and your hearts to make it to tend of the level while finding the large golden coins needed to unlock later levels.

This game features:

  • unique level design
  • state-of-1990 2D pixelated graphics
  • thoughtful, replayable levels
  • fun and challenging mechanic
  • playable in any browser or device
  • no cost, no advertising, no microtransactions, and no users accounts
  • easy to pick up and play anywhere
